name: Hammer the Gap
text: You repeatedly strike the same location, causing increasing amounts of damage.
benefit: When you take a full-attack action, each consecutive hit against the same opponent deals extra damage equal to the number of previous consecutive hits you have made against that opponent this turn. This damage is multiplied on a critical hit.
staminaText: When you use this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to increase the amount of extra damage dealt by 1 point per consecutive hit you make.
text_zh: 你多次命中相同的位置，造成越来越大的伤害。
benefit_zh: 当你进行全力攻击，每当你的攻击命中一个相同的敌人，你就能对其造成相当于本轮之前命中它的次数的额外伤害。该伤害可以被重击乘算。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来提升每次后续攻击的额额外伤害1点。
